N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 489.6 - Responsibilities of local departments of social services

State Regulations
(a) In addition to the responsibilities described in applicable sections of this

Part and Parts 485 and 486 of this Title, local department of social services
staff shall provide orientation to family-type care and assist the operator of
a family-type home to develop procedures and mechanisms to: (1)
obtain required health and mental health
information concerning residents and prospective residents; (2)
arrange for professional evaluation of
residents, and for the transfer of the resident to an appropriate level of
care, if necessary; (3)
establish
linkages with community resources; and
(4)
fulfill recordkeeping
requirements. (b) Social
services district staff must provide residential placement services for adults
to eligible residents of family-type homes in accordance with the department's
consolidated services plan and Part 458 of this Title. Notes
